`RiverML` uses the following Machine Learning workflow:

1. Derive the [target](articles/make_target_dataset.html) and [training datasets](articles/make_training_dataset.html)
2. Run a [benchmark](articles/ML_training.html) of models
3. [Process the benchmark results](articles/processing_benchmark_results.html)
4. Infer and train [optimal models](https://hrvg.github.io/RiverML/articles/ML_training.html#fetching-benchmark-data-if-final-is-true-1) from the benchmark results
5. [Make predictions](articles/making_predictions.html)
6. [Map predictions](articles/mapping_predictions.html)
